title: Did Clarence Thomas’ Wife Ginni Sponsor 80 Buses to Capitol Riots?
subtitle: The wife of the Supreme Court justice has been a vocal activist for fringe right-wing causes for over a decade.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Virginia "Ginni" Thomas, wife of Supreme Court Justice Clarence Thomas, sponsored 80 buses to transport participants to the "Save America" rally on Jan. 6, 2021.
